title: Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020)) of the Health Act 1947 (No. 28 of 1947)
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A -
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A - 
Temporary Restrictions) (Covid-19) (Restrictions upon Travel to the State 
from Certain States) (No. 2) (Amendment) Regulations 2021.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited health act 1947 (section 31a - temporary restrictions) (covid-19) (restrictions upon travel state certain states) (no 2) (amendment) regulation 2021

title: Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020)) of the Health Act 1947 (No. 28 of 1947)
heading: 2. The Health Act 1947 (Section 31A - Temporary Restrictions) (Covid19) (Restrictions upon Travel to the State from Certain States) (No. 2)
text_raw:
2. The Health Act 1947 (Section 31A - Temporary Restrictions) (Covid19) (Restrictions upon Travel to the State from Certain States) (No. 2) 
Regulations 2021 (No. 11 of 2021) are amended, in paragraph (3) of 
Regulation 1, by the substitution of “the 5th day of March 2021” for “the 31st 
day of January 2021”. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

30 January, 2021. 

STEPHEN DONNELLY, 
Minister for Health. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 2nd February, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [31] 3

title: Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020)) of the Health Act 1947 (No. 28 of 1947)
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations, made under section 31A of the Health Act 1947 (inserted 
by section 10 of the Health (Preservation and Protection and other Emergency 
Measures in the Public Interest) Act 2020), extend the effective date of S.I. No. 
11/2021 - Health Act 1947 (Section 31A - Temporary Restrictions) (Covid-19) 
(Restrictions upon Travel to the State from Certain States) (No. 2) Regulations 
2021 until 5th March 2021.
